trans-unit.source: Create the project in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Create the project in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to:
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to:

trans-unit.source: Create and manage <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>
trans-unit.target: Create and manage <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>

trans-unit.source: Configure <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> to receive and send messages
trans-unit.target: Configure <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> to receive and send messages

trans-unit.source: Use <link xlink:href="d8543a8b-269d-4d11-abfa-68ddf2435bec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Message Maps and Transforms</link> to manipulate data
trans-unit.target: Use <link xlink:href="d8543a8b-269d-4d11-abfa-68ddf2435bec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Message Maps and Transforms</link> to manipulate data

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">BizTalk Adapter Service</link>, you can connect to on-premises LOB applications from the cloud
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">BizTalk Adapter Service</link>, you can connect to on-premises LOB applications from the cloud

trans-unit.source: But how and where do we start creating solutions to achieve each of these business objectives?
trans-unit.target: But how and where do we start creating solutions to achieve each of these business objectives?

trans-unit.source: For business-to-business messaging using EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT, there is a <token>af_integration</token> portal where you can add your trading partners and create agreements between them.
trans-unit.target: For business-to-business messaging using EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT, there is a <token>af_integration</token> portal where you can add your trading partners and create agreements between them.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8d8d6123-1102-4757-818d-f74a2ed83256" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Components for B2B Messaging</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8d8d6123-1102-4757-818d-f74a2ed83256" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Components for B2B Messaging</link>.

trans-unit.source: You use the <token>af_integration</token> project system to create a part or all of a <token>af_integration</token> solution.
trans-unit.target: You use the <token>af_integration</token> project system to create a part or all of a <token>af_integration</token> solution.

trans-unit.source: The core element of any such solution is a <token>msgflow_proj</token> — a collection of items such as <token>xml_bridge</token>s, <token>lobconnect</token> component, <token>transform</token>s, and schemas that you can build and deploy to <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: The core element of any such solution is a <token>msgflow_proj</token> — a collection of items such as <token>xml_bridge</token>s, <token>lobconnect</token> component, <token>transform</token>s, and schemas that you can build and deploy to <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: These items are used together to configure an end-to-end message flow.
trans-unit.target: These items are used together to configure an end-to-end message flow.

trans-unit.source: For example, a message is sent to an <token>xml_bridge</token>, which processes it and sends it over to the <token>lobconnect</token> component, which updates the backend LOB application.
trans-unit.target: For example, a message is sent to an <token>xml_bridge</token>, which processes it and sends it over to the <token>lobconnect</token> component, which updates the backend LOB application.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you generally include one or more of the components from the following list.
trans-unit.target: When you create a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you generally include one or more of the components from the following list.

trans-unit.source: These components play specific roles in creating your solution:
trans-unit.target: These components play specific roles in creating your solution:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel>: Bridges are message mediation patterns that process the message as it is relayed from the client to the destination endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel>: Bridges are message mediation patterns that process the message as it is relayed from the client to the destination endpoint.

trans-unit.source: As part of the message mediation, <token>bridge</token>s also extract/promote properties that can be used for message routing/processing.
trans-unit.target: As part of the message mediation, <token>bridge</token>s also extract/promote properties that can be used for message routing/processing.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1aef098a-aec9-4258-adb0-ad5abfa5b820" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Message-Processing Bridges</link> and <link xlink:href="81b3d264-667e-4fe0-bbdd-14293cedd9da" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Bridges</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1aef098a-aec9-4258-adb0-ad5abfa5b820" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Message-Processing Bridges</link> and <link xlink:href="81b3d264-667e-4fe0-bbdd-14293cedd9da" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Bridges</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Sources</embeddedLabel>: These represent the message sources from which a <token>bridge</token> can receive messages.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Sources</embeddedLabel>: These represent the message sources from which a <token>bridge</token> can receive messages.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8d63ef53-1ef7-4110-8f65-f5c24cb8b886" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Message Sources</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8d63ef53-1ef7-4110-8f65-f5c24cb8b886" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Message Sources</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Destinations</embeddedLabel>: These represent the endpoints where the messages, processed by the <token>bridge</token>, are routed to.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Destinations</embeddedLabel>: These represent the endpoints where the messages, processed by the <token>bridge</token>, are routed to.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="88423ec6-07f2-40df-94d1-fbf9296ed947" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Message Destinations</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="88423ec6-07f2-40df-94d1-fbf9296ed947" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring Message Destinations</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token></embeddedLabel>: Provides connectivity from <token>af_integration</token> application to on-premises LOB applications such as <token>ssNoVersion</token>, SAP, Oracle, Siebel, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token></embeddedLabel>: Provides connectivity from <token>af_integration</token> application to on-premises LOB applications such as <token>ssNoVersion</token>, SAP, Oracle, Siebel, and so on.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Connect</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Connect</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Schemas</embeddedLabel>: A schema describes the structure of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Schemas</embeddedLabel>: A schema describes the structure of an XML document.

trans-unit.source: Schemas exchange information among applications within an organization or among trading partners.
trans-unit.target: Schemas exchange information among applications within an organization or among trading partners.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel><token>transform</token>s</embeddedLabel>: A <token>transform</token> maps data from one format to another.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel><token>transform</token>s</embeddedLabel>: A <token>transform</token> maps data from one format to another.

trans-unit.source: <token>transform</token>s present source schemas and destination schemas side-by-side and enable you to define mapping between data elements of different messages.
trans-unit.target: <token>transform</token>s present source schemas and destination schemas side-by-side and enable you to define mapping between data elements of different messages.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="d8543a8b-269d-4d11-abfa-68ddf2435bec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Transforms</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="d8543a8b-269d-4d11-abfa-68ddf2435bec" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Transforms</link>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites for Configuring a <token>af_integration</token> Application
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites for Configuring a <token>af_integration</token> Application

trans-unit.source: You must meet the following prerequisites before you can start creating <token>af_integration</token> applications:
trans-unit.target: You must meet the following prerequisites before you can start creating <token>af_integration</token> applications:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Install Azure BizTalk Services SDK</link> to start creating <token>af_integration</token> applications, including extending the reach of your <token>af_integration</token> applications to on-premises LOB applications like <token>ssNoVersion</token>, SAP, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Install Azure BizTalk Services SDK</link> to start creating <token>af_integration</token> applications, including extending the reach of your <token>af_integration</token> applications to on-premises LOB applications like <token>ssNoVersion</token>, SAP, and so on.

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid <token>ac2</token> and <token>sb2</token> namespace with credentials.
trans-unit.target: You must have a valid <token>ac2</token> and <token>sb2</token> namespace with credentials.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section
